# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(base_test LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(base_test "")
set_target_properties(base_test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "base_test")
set_target_properties(base_test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")
target_include_directories(base_test PRIVATE
    src/base
)
target_include_directories(base_test PRIVATE
    C:/Users/LENOVO/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/gtest/1.12.1/25c962627a494e83bc3035ae7a47f9c3/include
)
target_compile_options(base_test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(base_test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(base_test PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(base_test PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET base_test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(base_test PRIVATE
    gmock
    gtest
    gtest_main
)
target_link_directories(base_test PRIVATE
    C:/Users/LENOVO/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/gtest/1.12.1/25c962627a494e83bc3035ae7a47f9c3/lib
)
target_sources(base_test PRIVATE
    src/test/base_test.cpp
    src/base/base.c
)
